USE nyc_taxi_ldw;
GO

----------------------------------------
-- External File Formats for "csv" files
----------------------------------------
-- Create an external file format for DELIMITED (CSV/TSV) files.
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csv_file_format')
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
      , FORMAT_OPTIONS (

        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','
       ,STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
       ,FIRST_ROW = 2 
       ,USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
       ,ENCODING = 'UTF8'
       ,PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
    
    );


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- External File Formats for "csv files with PARSER VERSION = 1.0"
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'csv_file_format_pv1')
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv1
-- Create an external file format for DELIMITED (CSV/TSV) files.
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format_pv1
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
      , FORMAT_OPTIONS (
        FIELD_TERMINATOR = ','
       ,STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
       ,FIRST_ROW = 2 
       ,USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
       ,ENCODING = 'UTF8'
       ,PARSER_VERSION = '1.0'
        )
    
    );

----------------------------------------
-- External File Formats for "tsv" files
----------------------------------------

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'tsv_file_format')
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format
-- Create an external file format for DELIMITED (CSV/TSV) files.
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT tsv_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT
      , FORMAT_OPTIONS (

        FIELD_TERMINATOR = '\t'
       ,STRING_DELIMITER = '"'
       ,FIRST_ROW = 2 
       ,USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE
       ,ENCODING = 'UTF8'
       ,PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
        )
    
    );

--------------------------------------------------
-- External File Formats for "PARQUET" files
--------------------------------------------------
--Create an external file format for PARQUET files.

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'parquet_file_format')
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
      , DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
    );

--------------------------------------------------
-- External File Formats for "DELTA" files
--------------------------------------------------
--Create an external file format for PARQUET files.

IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'delta_file_format')
    DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT delta_file_format
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELTA
    );
